root.title: hutchison unit bui contain crane japan
root.body: contain port oper hong kong intern termin ltd 89 pct hold unit hutchison whampoa ltd hwhh.hk sai place 164 mln h.k. dlr order seven quaysid contain crane 800 ton japan mitsui engin shipbuild co ltd mset.t mai 1988 august 1989 deliveri hong kong intern termin oper 32 crane
